Name: Performance
Description: Expected result vs Actual Result
Fields to Use: squad_rating, home_team_score, away_team_score

Name: Adaptability
Description: Points gained or lost when losing or winning at certain points in the game. Such as halftime, second half, and goals scored or conceded past the 80th minute that change the game
Fields to Use: time_minute, home_score_before, home_score_after, away_score_after, away_score_before, home_team_score, away_team_score

Name: Player Development
Description: Do player ratings usually go up or down when they play for this coach
Fields to Use: All attribute level ratings

Name: Youth Development
Description: Do players under 23 ratings go up or down for this coach?
Fields to Use: All attribute level ratings for players under 23

Name: Defense
Description: Goals, shots, etc conceded to league average
Fields to Use: home_team_score, away_team_score, home_xg, away_xg, home_xg_open_play, away_xg_open_play, home_shots_on_target, away_shots_on_target

Name: Discipline
Description: Yellow cards, red cards, fouls compared to league average
Fields to Use: home_fouls ,away_fouls,number_home_yellow_cards, number_of_away_yellow_cards, number_of_home_red_cards, number_of_away_red_cards

Name: Rotation
Description: Rotation of players in the starting XI
Fields to Use: match_lineup_players table

Name: Attack
Description: Goals, shots, etc scored to league average
Fields to Use: home_team_score, away_team_score, home_xg, away_xg, home_xg_open_play, away_xg_open_play, home_shots_on_target, away_shots_on_target

Name: Decisions
Description: Quality of substitutions to league average
Fields to Use: match_substitutions_table and then check for result changes for the better, worse, or stayed the same depending on desired outcome

Name: Attacking Style
Description: Style of play with the ball
Fields to Use: home or away own_half_passes vs home or away opposition_half_passes, homne or away big_chances, home or away accurate_long_balls, home or away touches_opp_box, home or away possesion

Name: Defending Style
Description: Style of play without the ball
Fields to Use: home or away duels_won, home or away tackles, home or away possession

Name: GoalScoring
Description: Pure goals scored per 90 metric
Fields to Use: event_type = 'goal', player_name matches player_name iin match_lineup players. This is for matches without the player_stats table available, player_id is null in match_events so we need to map the name, match id to the lineup to get the real player_id in lineup table. We can then check match_substitutes to see if a player was subbed on or off and then do their goals per 90 metric. If a match doesnt have this available we assume they played 90 minutes. If player_stats is available we use stat_key = 'goals', stat_value, stat_key = 'minutes_played', stat_value, player_id

Name: Finishing
Description: How well a player finishes their chances
Fields to Use: stat_key where we see goals, total_shots, expected_goals, expected_goals_on_target_variant, ShotsOnTarget, big_chance_missed_title, stat_total where null is 0

Name: Long Shots
Description: Using the match_shopmap table we can grab how good a player is at long shots
Fields to Use: player_id, x, y, is_blocked, is_on_target, expected_goals, is_from_inside_box, event_type = 'Goal', 'Miss', 'AttemptSaved'

Name: Free Kicks
Description: Using the match_shotmap table we can track situation = 'FreeKick' to see how good a player is at free kicks
Fields to Use: player_id, x, y, is_blocked, is_on_target, expected_goals, is_from_inside_box, event_type = 'Goal', 'Miss', 'AttemptSaved'

Name: Technique
Description: How technical a player is in the game
Fields to Use: dribbles_succeeded, accurate_passes (percentage), accurate_crosses (percentage), passes_into_final_third

Name: Crosses
Description: How good a player is at crosses and how often they cross
Fields to Use: accurate_crosses, crosses, corners

Name: Dribbling
Description: How good a player is at dribbling
Fields to Use: dribbles_succeeded, dispossessed

Name: First Touch
Description: How good a players first touch is
Fields to Use: touches, dispossessed, big_chance_missed_title

Name: Marking
Description: How good a player marks their man
Fields to Use: defensive_actions, shot_blocks, clearances, recoveries, dribbled_past

Name: Tackling
Description: How good a player tackles
Fields to Use: matchstats.headers.tackles, shot_blocks, aerials_won, duel_lost, duel_won, ground_duels_won, last_man_tackle

Name: Aggression
Description: How aggressive a player is
Fields to Use: conceded_penalties, fouls, total_shots

Name: Anticipation
Description: How good a player can anticipate
Fields to Use: interceptions

Name: Bravery
Description: How brave a player is
Fields to Use: duel_won, chances_created, minutes_played, recoveries, dribbles_succeeded, touches_opp_box

Name: Composure
Description: How composed a player is
Fields to Use: touches_opp_box, accurate_crosses, accurate_passes,  dispossessed, dribbled_past, big_chance_missed_title, clearance_off_the_line, last_man_tackle, owngoal, Offsides, missed_penalty

Name: Concentration
Description: Performance in big matches
Fields to Use: Metric that finds where team rating is less than opponent team rating

Name: Decisions
Description: Decision making of the player
Fields to Use: dispossessed, accurate_crosses, accurate_passes, passes_into_final_third, ShotsOnTarget

Name: Flair
Description: Dribbling stats
Fields to Use: dribbles_succeeded, long_balls_accurate, was_fouled

Name: Leadership
Description: Overall squad performance metric when a player is in the starting lineup
Fields to Use: wins, goals scored, goals conceded when a player is in starting lineup

Name: Off the Ball
Description: How good a player is off the ball
Fields to Use: big_chance_missed_title, recoveries, interceptions, shot_blocks, xg_and_xa

Name: Positioning
Description: How good a player is in position
Fields to Use: expected_goals, error_led_to_goal, interceptions, shot_blocks, expected_goals_on_target_variant, touches_opp_box, clearance_off_the_line

Name: Teamwork
Description: How helpful a player is
Fields to Use: assists, accurate_passes, chances_created, expected_assists, defensive_actions

Name: Vision
Description: The vision of a player
Fields to Use: assists, accurate_passes, chances_created, expected_assists, passes_into_final_third, long_balls_accurate

Name: Work Rate
Description: Work rate of a player
Fields to Use: minutes_played, rating_title

Name: Stamina
Description: How many minutes a player played
Fields to Use: minutes_played

Name: Jumping
Description: The aerial ability
Fields to Use: aerials_won, headed_clearance

Name: Natural Fitness
Description: Injury Proneness
Fields to Use: Check match_unavailable_players table and find injury_id, if populated for the player_id and match_id they are injured for this game

Name: Strength
Description: Duels won
Fields to Use: duel_lost, duel_won

Name: Consistency
Description: How volatile is a player performance?
Fields to Use: rating_title

Name: Versatility
Description: How many positions is a player average or above at
Fields to Use: use match_lineup_players to find the position_id for the player and see what positions they’ve played in the past and how good they were in that position and formation

Name: Adaptability
Description: How good is a player that plays in different leagues and countries?
Fields to Use: Track performance for players across leagues, countries and see how adaptable they are

Name: Loyalty
Description: How many years does a player stay on one team
Fields to Use: Track how many years a player stays on one team

Name: Pressure
Description: How good is a player in a big game
Fields to Use: Track player performance for big games

Name: Possession
Description: How much possession does a team usual have in a game
Fields to Use: home and away possession

Name: Chances
Description: expected goals, chances created of a team
Fields to Use: home and away xg, home and away xg_open_play, home and away total_shots, home and away big_chances

Name: Aggression
Description: How aggressive a team is
Fields to Use: yellow_cards, red_cards, offsides, fouls

Name: Important Matches
Description: Performance in big matches
Fields to Use: Metric that finds where team rating is less than opponent team rating

Description: How much possession does a team usual have in a game
Fields to Use: home and away possession
